episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4001_1001_0:
Congratulations on winning that Pokémon
tournament, Blue!

You truly are awesome! You’re a role model
to all us Pallet Towners!
Heh! Thanks for the support, you two!

I couldn’t embarrass myself with a poor
performance, so I went all out!
At least, that’s what I’d LIKE to say, but...

It seems another sync pair who saw your
battle just now wants to challenge you.
Sure, why not! I’ll take ’em on!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4001_1001_1:
Who is it? If it’s someone Blue knows,
wouldn’t they just ask him directly?

Maybe it’s a sync pair who recently arrived
on Pasio?
Heh... You’ll see when you meet them.
Allow me to introduce you. Come on in!
He definitely LOOKS like Red, but...
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4001_1001_2:
Dang... Well, you’re quiet just like him—
that’s for sure.

Either way, I’ll figure you out once I
battle you!

This setup is pretty familiar, huh? But it
doesn’t matter.

This time, things won’t play out how
you think!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/6801_1101_0:
Red seems excited, burning with fighting
spirit from head to toe!

His heart is pounding, telling him to give it
his all here on Pasio!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4002_1001_0: There really IS something off about Red.

I can’t quite put my finger on it...but it’s
almost as if he’s not used to how Blue and
Pidgeot are battling!

Pidgeot and I haven’t even gotten
serious yet!

We’re gonna go all out, so you better give
us everything you’ve got!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4002_1001_1:
Heh! Don’t think I’ve seen that look on your
face before!

If you thought your Pikachu could take down
my Pidgeot, you thought wrong!

Depends on whether you’re really Red,
doesn’t it.
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4002_1001_2:
With that strength, that was definitely
Red, right?
But there was something different about him.
Who in the world WAS that?
That was Red—the real deal. I’m sure of it.

But it might’ve been a different Red than the
one we know.

Apparently, some people on Pasio came here
from parallel universes.
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4002_1001_3: I see! So it was another Red...

(They reminded me of Red back when he
was traveling across Kanto!)
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4003_1001_0:
I know that look. You’re thinking about your
hometown, aren’t you.
Hoho! Blue told me you were here.
I came looking for you to say hello!
Ah yes. You have a great look in your eyes.

It’s the strong yet gentle look of someone
who’s faced head-on every Pokémon and
Trainer he’s met.
You and your Pokémon are surely happy.
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4003_1001_1:
You’ve had quite a journey as a Pokémon
Trainer, haven’t you.

Along the way, you’ve ventured through
unknown lands, met new Pokémon, and
battled formidable foes.

I’m sure it wasn’t all fun and games.
You must’ve had your share of struggles.

Ever since that day you first got your
Pokédex and left Pallet Town...
Has your Pokémon journey been fun?
I see! Well, that’s just great!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4003_1001_2:
Your very own Pokémon legend will continue
to unfold!

A world of dreams and adventures awaits!
Let’s go!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4004_1001_0: Apparently, a Red look-alike was spotted.

Yeah! It’s been the talk of the town all
over Pasio!

He appeared out of nowhere, much like the
Red we know...
People say he’s also just as strong.

As a Gym Leader who’s faced Red before,
I’d like to see for myself!
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4005_1001_0:
Man, Red always draws attention wherever
he goes.

He never says anything, yet everyone
always wants to be around him.
episode_event_ch0365_00_red2/4006_1001_0:
I met that other Red everyone’s talking
about—and battled him.

I wonder where he came from. I’m so
curious!
